title: Jhin`s animations
body:
logged in just to praise the animation department for their AMAZEBALLZ work they did on Jhin. It is so fluid, so cocky, so whimsical, so dancey, i could go on...

I`ll feed my ass off just by gazing at how he moves, that`s for sure.

You had one job, and you absolutely NAILED IT. I applaud you //

[](http://memegenerator.net/instance/60206232)

replies.body: Thank you sir/madame! I will tell the team, much appreciated.
The way he walks, its just so...... mesmerizing
League needed someone with a "Bitch,I'm FABULOUS" walk.
I hope Taric gets that kind of walk.

Hate to necro this but I couldn't resist, I was hoping I wasn't the only one who's in love with everything about his animations.
Its SO unique to league, no one moves as interestingly in the game imo. Hats off to you guys for sure @riotlamz and your squad.
